channel.title: Just a question, kinda skiped this when learning about server making
channel.description: uhhh... i was just wondering is it possibe for a npc to do a emote like wave? if so plz explain.....

item.title: Just a question, kinda skiped this when learning about server making
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Yes thats the “attack emote” but im not sure yet if u can add a normal emote.
Try using the “Search Button” !
Search for “Npc doing emotes”
Or something u like 2 search for.

Sorry my english isn’t perfect because im german ! Learning it. :)!

Read full topic

but what i know is how you can change the way it attacks… for example like a infernal doing a mage throwing emote when attacking…
